description: This file is a test specification for the HelloWorld Vue component using Vitest. It verifies that the component renders the expected text when mounted.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite for the HelloWorld component

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines a test case that checks if the component renders properly

ctags.name: wrapper
ctags.pattern: /^    const wrapper = mount(HelloWorld, { props: { msg: 'Hello Vitest' } })$/
